50340.affected_area: Sault Ste Marie (The P Patch & Sault College Ontario)
live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50340.summary: Some customers in the The P Patch and the Sault College Ontario areas area of Sault Ste Marie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50340.title: Jun 6 - Sault Ste Marie (The P Patch & Sault College Ontario ) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
